Text: Houston Angel Network Meeting RecapAll Attached is a brief recap of yesterdays Angel breakfast at the Houstonian We had companies present for minutes each Those companies along with information about their prescheduled follow up meetings is listed below Fiber Dynamics AM Mike Burke email IPM PM Ariel Leibovitz email Meetrix AM Kerry Brooks email NeoSurg PM Bryan Emerson email If you were not able to make the breakfast but are interested in attending a follow up meeting please contact the Angel advocate directly Please make sure to contact the advocate so that if there are any changes to the meeting schedule he will know to inform you We also had the CEOs of two companies IDev Technologies and Rotary Steerable Tools give updates on the recent developments at their companies If you would like more information on follow up meetings with either of those two companies please contact me directly and I will put you in touch with the correct Angel advocate We spent roughly minutes discussing administrative issues concerning the new structure of HAN I have attached a copy of that Powerpoint presentation for your review Please do not hesitate to contact either Michelle Weisblatt at or Kerry Brooks at with any question comments or suggestions Thank you Michelle Weisblatt septemberppt
